Delivery

Class Truck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delivery.Truck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrdinaryTruck, RefrigeratedTruck

    public abstract class Truck
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an abstract class for the two truck types (RefrigeratedTruck and OrdinaryTruck).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Wai & Kwun Hyo Lee
